resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>990f7573-b00e-4a20-8893-88c0514fd427#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az őskőkori művészet</string>
            <string language="en">Paleolithic art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleolithic kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art de Paleolithic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte de Paleolithic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte di Paleolithic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλαιολιθική τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte de Paleolithic</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kisművészetek és a barlangrajzok</string>
            <string language="en">little arts and cave paintings</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">paleolitikum,  barlangrajzok,  csonteszközök,  kisplasztika,  </string>
            <string language="en">Paleolithic age, cave paintings, bone tools, small sculpture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kleine künste und Höhleanstriche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">petits arts et peintures de caverne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">artes e pinturas pequenas da caverna</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arti e pitture piccole della caverna</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μικρές τέχνες και έργα ζωγραφικής σπηλιών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pequeños artes y pinturas de la cueva</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleolithic Alter, Höhleanstriche, Knochenhilfsmittel,
kleine Skulptur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Âge de Paleolithic, peintures de caverne, outils d'os, 
petite sculpture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idade de Paleolithic, pinturas da caverna, ferramentas 
do osso, sculpture pequeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Età di Paleolithic, pitture della caverna, strumenti 
dell'osso, piccola scultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλαιολιθική ηλικία, έργα ζωγραφικής σπηλιών, εργαλεία 
κόκκαλων, μικρό γλυπτό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edad de Paleolithic, pinturas de la cueva, herramientas
del hueso, escultura pequeña</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77295</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>

</expression>
